hero.subtitle: Consistent, predictable code isn't just easier to maintainâ€”it's essential for effective AI collaboration.

intro.title: The Challenge
intro.body: Inconsistent codebases confuse AI agents. Without clear patterns, AI struggles to understand context, make correct assumptions, and generate maintainable code.

serviceRepo.title: Service/Repository Pattern
serviceRepo.description: Separate business logic from data access. Services contain rules and validation, repositories handle database operations.
serviceRepo.why: Clear boundaries help AI understand where to make changes. Testing becomes trivial with mock repositories.

apiRoutes.title: Type-Safe API Routes
apiRoutes.description: All API routes use the createRouteHandler wrapper for consistent authentication and error handling.
apiRoutes.why: AI can confidently add new endpoints following the established pattern. No guesswork about auth or response format.

secureFetch.title: Secure Server Communication
secureFetch.description: Server actions use secureFetch to call APIs with automatic session forwarding. Never expose APIs directly to clients.
secureFetch.why: Security by default. AI knows exactly how to make authenticated requests without manual header management.

validation.title: Centralized Validation
validation.description: Zod schemas co-located with services provide runtime type safety and validation.
validation.why: Type inference from schemas keeps validation and types in sync. AI can safely modify schemas knowing types update automatically.

database.title: Type-Safe Database Layer
database.description: Drizzle ORM with repository pattern abstracts data access and provides full type safety.
database.why: AI can query databases confidently with IntelliSense. Schema changes propagate through the type system.

testing.title: Black-Box Service Testing
testing.description: Test services in isolation using mock repositories to verify business logic.
testing.why: AI can confidently add new tests following the established pattern. Services remain testable without database dependencies.
